text: Hefdah-e-Shahrivar Metro Station is a station of Mashhad Metro Line 1. The station opened on 10 October 2011. It is located on Fada'ian-e Eslam Blvd.. ==References== Category:Mashhad Metro stations Category:Railway stations opened in 2011 Category:2011 establishments in Iran
title: Hefdah-e-Shahrivar Metro Station (Mashhad Metro)
